attributes.action: Keep the Speaker of the House of Commons, Michael Martin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The House of Commons should not be calling for the resignation of the Speaker, it is the action of MP's that has caused the recent scandal surrounding expenses claims. They were not forced to claim the money and should have used their own judgement. If anything MP's should stand down themselves if they feel so strongly on the issue. It would be more appropriate to tighten the expenses system and how the parliamentary fees office works and checks claims.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
